oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spectral red-shifting of multi-frequency Raman orders
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CUI, Z
CHATURVEDI, M
TIAN, B
ACKERT, J
TURNER, FC
STRICKLAND, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stimulated
Raman Generation
Nonlinear four-wave mixing
Ultrafast lasers
Nonlinear optics
GENERATION
PULSES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, the spectral characteristics of the anti-Stokes orders generated by multi-frequency Raman generation are investigated. In particular, we observe that the orders can be red-shifted from the expected Raman transition frequency. The experimental observations indicate that Stark shifting rather than four-wave mixing is responsible for the red-shift. Current numerical models are insufficient to reproduce the experimental observations of red-shifting of the anti-Stokes orders. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
